name: Success or Failure
description:
Success or Failure is here...the brand new Football Management game for the ZX Spectrum.

Do you long back to the days when Football Management games were simple games written in basic, where you could start a new match within minutes?

If yes, then this might just be the thing for you :-)

Test your abilities as a Football Manager in this brand new game written for the ZX Spectrum 48K/128K.

A different kind of Football Management game, including features never seen in any Football Management games before :-)
